articles.title: Trump tariffs: Asia is reeling but is anyone winning? - BBC
articles.description: The US president has reset the tariffs clock again, leaving Asia's export-driven economies in limbo.
articles.content:
Osmond ChiaBusiness reporter, BBC News
President Trump has extended the deadline for tariff negotiations - again
"Deeply regrettable" is how Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba has described US … [+6973 chars]
